name: NFL Blitz 2001
description:
Back of Box - Game Boy Color (US) (from Ad Blurbs)

No Refs. No Rules. No Mercy.

New and improved for the 2001 season!

Holding strong to its "No Refs, No Rules, No Mercy" roots, NFL® Blitz™ 2001 sacks the competition with huge hits and wild celebrations that make simulation football games seem tame.

  • New Plays and Play Books
  • New Mini-Game Mode
  • 2000 Roster Updates
  • Classic On-Fire Mode
  • Improved Player Attributes
  • Fast and Furious Gameplay!
